scripts.build: yarn workspace @tracelet/core run build && yarn workspace @tracelet/ui run build && yarn workspace @tracelet/express run build
scripts.pack:sdks: rm -rf packages/**/*.tgz && yarn build && npm pack --workspace=@tracelet/core && npm pack --workspace=@tracelet/express && npm pack --workspace=@tracelet/ui
